headline: Is United Airlines (UAL) Pricing An Opportunity After Strong Three Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether United Airlines Holdings is priced fairly or offering value right now, you are not alone. Airline stocks can often move sharply when sentiment shifts, which can make it harder to judge value. United's share price recently closed at US$115.91, with returns of 13.3% over the last 7 days, 6.3% over 1 year, and a very large gain over 3 years. The 30 day return is slightly negative at 0.6%, and the year to date return sits at 2.6%. Recent headlines around airlines...

headline: Pressure mounts on American Airlines CEO as carrier lags rivals
summary: American Airlines made $111 million last year, while rivals Delta Air Lines and United Airlines, brought in $5 billion and $3.3 billion, respectively.
